Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts a unique blend of quality and functionality but also comes with a range of exclusive features that set it apart from the rest. Considering its unparalleled value and the attention to detail that has gone into its creation, I am extending this opportunity to you at an introductory price of $14999. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to experience the best of what we have to offer without compromising on quality. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and delivery tailored to your convenience. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,999. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,999
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
